ambient: The scene shows a large walled city, cannons and a blast sound. Suggests war or attack. The overall atmosphere is tense and dramatic. | Outside, in front of the wall, the day seems to be clear. | A sunny day in a town. People are walking around. | The scene has an air of tension, with the soldiers seemingly having some drinks and Eren and Mikasa looking concerned. The overall atmosphere feels like something is about to happen. | A bustling town or city, likely the area where they live. People are walking around. The atmosphere is somewhat somber due to Eren crying. | Outside the walls, with soldiers present and a large wall visible. | The scene takes place outside a gate, potentially the entrance to a walled city. The atmosphere is somewhat casual, with soldiers drinking and the characters interacting.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] An aerial view of a walled city with a cannon firing towards it. The scene focuses on the perspective of being within the walls of the city.

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [fwOOO]

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren is crying and being questioned by Mikasa, and then Hannes appears. The scene is set in a town or city, with people walking around.

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: ...THAT I WAS CRYING.

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: DON'T TELL ANYONE...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] DON'T BE STUPID! LIKE I CAN TELL MY OLD MAN ABOUT THIS?!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: CRYING FOR NO REASON...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [confused] WHAT ARE YOU CRYING ABOUT, EREN?

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [SNIFF]

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren, Mikasa and Hannes interact with each other and some soldiers at a gate. Soldiers are drinking.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [curious] DID MIKASA GET MAD AT YOU FOR SOME- THING?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [annoyed] HUH?! WHAT MAKES YOU THINK I'M CRYING?!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: YOU REEK OF LIQUOR !!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [calm] WOULD YOU TWO LIKE TO JOIN IN?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: DRINKING AGAIN...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WHAT THE...?!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: OH! WE'RE ON GATE DUTY TODAY.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: NO... UM... WHAT ABOUT YOUR WORK?

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Hannes and some soldiers are talking, then it cuts to Eren and Mikasa looking concerned, while another panel focuses on Mikasa with a worried expression. The scene seems to be leading to some kind of emergency.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: BUT IN AN EMERGENCY, WOULD YOU BE ABLE TO FIGHT DRUNK?!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] WHAT'S THE BIG DEAL IF LIQUOR HAPPENS TO BE AMONG THE RATIONS SOMETIMES?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WE GET HUNGRY AND THIRSTY, HANGING OUT HERE ALL DAY.

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [TWITCH]

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [determined] I'M TALKING ABOUT IF THEY BROKE DOWN THE WALL...

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: [angry] !! I DON'T BELIEVE THIS! IT'S OBVIOUS!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and Hannes are speaking, Hannes is holding his head. The scene cuts to a view outside the walls with soldiers.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [irritated] HEY, EREN! DON'T SUDDENLY RAISE YOUR VOICE LIKE THAT...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [fearful] B-BUT IT'S DANGEROUS TO FEEL AT EASE LIKE THIS!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] HAHAHA... THE DOCTOR'S SON HAS SPIRIT!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and Mikasa are discussing the situation with Hannes and other soldiers. They are by the wall.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [confused] But Eren...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: THAT AIN'T A BAD IDEA EITHER!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [annoyed] YOU HAVE SOLDIERS ON ACTIVE DUTY WHEN THE SITUATION HAS GONE TO HELL...

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and others talking in a street. Hannes is talking about someone wanting to join the Survey Corps.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] BUT IF THEY WANNA HAVE FUN PLAYING WAR, LET 'EM, I SAY!!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: [angry] HELL... I CAN'T UNDERSTAND THOSE GUYS IN THE SURVEY CORPS WHO WANNA GO OUTSIDE THE WALL!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: IT'S JUST LIKE HANNES SAYS.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ...ISN'T THAT...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ... LIKE BEING A CAGED ANIMAL?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WE DON'T HAVE TO GO OUTSIDE THE WALL FOR OUR WHOLE LIVES...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WE CAN EAT, SLEEP AND SURVIVE JUST FINE HERE... BUT...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: DON'T TELL ME...

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: PFFT...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: ...HE WANTS TO JOIN THE SURVEY CORPS?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] WHAT A CRACKPOT...
